FuncDef: This command configures the type of schedule to run, including one-time only (oneshot), periodic or calendar-based runs. All runs are determined by month, day of month or weekday, hour, minute and interval (seconds).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the schedule. The name can be up to 32 characters.
Specifies the owner name of the schedule. The name can be up to 32 characters. ParamDefault: Default- TiMOS CLI
